segments.text: Really ? Did you find any information about a new job ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah , I just got some good information off the internet .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Great ! Do you think you have a chance at getting the job ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I didn ’ t just find out about one job . There were several ones that looked good .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Maybe I should try looking on the web for work .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure you have to be patient . But I think it ’ s much less trouble to sit in front of a computer than to go door to door or to make a lot of phone calls .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: But there must be so many people who also see the advertisement for that job on the net . You might have no chance .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How do you know if you don ’ t have a try ?
segments.speaker: S2
